solution_line_template: If Monica took {monica_subjects} subjects, Marius took {monica_subjects}+{marius_more_than_monica} = <<{monica_subjects}+{marius_more_than_monica}={marius_subjects}>>{marius_subjects} subjects.
Marius and Monica have {marius_subjects}+{monica_subjects} = <<{marius_subjects}+{monica_subjects}={marius_monica_total}>>{marius_monica_total} subjects which they've taken.

Since Millie is taking three more subjects than Marius, she is taking {marius_subjects}+{millie_more_than_marius} = <<{marius_subjects}+{millie_more_than_marius}={millie_subjects}>>{millie_subjects} subjects
Together, the three have taken {marius_monica_total}+{millie_subjects} = <<{marius_monica_total}+{millie_subjects}={total_subjects}>>{total_subjects} subjects.
